global.continue?: Sunteţi sigur că doriţi să continuați?
global.balanceErrorMessage: Nu aveţi suficient IOTA pentru a finaliza acest transfer.
global.transferErrorMessage: Ceva a mers prost în timpul transferului. Vă rugăm să încercaţi din nou.
global.transferSentMessage: Transferul a fost trimis în Tangle.
global.messageSentMessage: Transferul a fost trimis în Tangle.
global.keyReuseError: Nu puteţi trimite la o adresă din care a fost deja cheltuit.
global.invalidResponseExplanation: Nodul a returnat o eroare. Încercați să schimbați nodul.
global.invalidResponseFetchingAccount: Nodul a returnat un răspuns nevalid în timp ce prelua informaţiile contului dumneavoastră. Încercaţi să schimbaţi nodul.
global.invalidResponseFetchingAccountDesktop: Nodul a returnat un răspuns nevalid în timp ce prelua informaţiile contului dumneavoastră. Dacă problema dumneavoastră persistă, încercați să schimbați nodul sau să dezactivați reprezentantul sistemului dumneavoastră din setările Trinity.
global.nodeOutOfSyncExplanation: Nodul selectat nu este sincronizat. Vă rugăm să schimbaţi nodul sau încercaţi din nou.
global.experimentalNodeExplanation: Nodul pe care îl ai selectat rulează pe o versiune experimentală care nu este încă acceptată.Te rog să schimbi nodul sau să încerci din nou.
global.thisNodeOutOfSync: Acest nod nu este sincronizat. Vă rugăm să schimbaţi nodul sau încercaţi din nou.
global.unrecognisedPasswordExplanation: Parola nu a fost recunoscută. Încercaţi din nou.
global.unrecognisedAccountExplanation: Contul cu numele {{accountName}} nu a fost recunoscut. Luați în considerare să vă resetați portofelul.
global.emptyPasswordExplanation: Trebuie să introduceți o parolă. Vă rugăm încercați din nou.
global.syncInProgressExplanation: Vă rugăm să aşteptaţi până când sincronizarea se finalizează.
global.cannotPerformActionExplanation: Du-te la setările avansate pentru a reseta portofelul.
global.attachToTangleUnavailableExplanation: Dovada-De-Lucru la distanță este indisponibilă pe nodul selectat de dumneavoastră. Ori schimbați nodul ori selectați Dovadă-De-Lucru pe Local în Setări Avansate.
global.attachToTangleUnavailableExplanationShor: Dovada-De-Lucru la distanță este indisponibilă pe nodul selectat de dumneavoastră.
global.pressBackAgain: Apăsaţi înapoi din nou pentru a închide aplicaţia
global.reattached: Tranzactia a fost reatașată cu succes
global.rebroadcastError: Tranzacția nu a putut fi retransmisa
global.promoted: Transacția a fost promovata cu succes
global.autopromotionError: Auto-promovarea tranzactiei nu poate fi facuta
global.autopromotionErrorExplanation: Dovada-De-Lucru la distanță este indisponibilă pe nodul selectat de dumneavoastră. Vă rugăm schimbați nodul și reactivați promovarea automată.
global.promotionErrorExplanation: Ceva a mers prost în timp ce se promova tranzacţia. Vă rugăm să încercaţi din nou.
global.noLongerValid: Grupul pe care incercati sa il promovați nu este valid
global.transactionAlreadyConfirmedExplanation: Tranzacția pe care incercați sa o promovati a fost deja confirmată.
global.cannotSendToOwnExplanation: You cannot send to an address that is being used as an input in the transaction.
global.pleaseWaitExplanation: Trinity indeplinește alta functie. Vă rugăm sa asteptați si sa incercați din nou.
global.pleaseWaitTransferExplanation: Balanța actuala este implicat in alte transferuri. Vă rugăm sa asteptați pentru o confirmare inainte de a incerca din nou.
global.pleaseWaitIncomingTransferExplanation: Aveți tranzacții în curs de sosire. Vă rugăm să așteptați să fie confirmate înainte să încercați din nou.
global.snapshotTransitionInProgressExplanation: Please wait until the transition is complete.
global.nodeMustUseHTTPSExplanation: Doar noduri personalizate care folosesc HTTPS sunt acceptate.
global.nodeAutoChangedExplanation: Switched to new node {{- nodeAddress}} as selected node is offline.
global.fingerprintOnSend: Touch fingerprint reader to authorise the transfer
global.masterKey: Your IOTA seed is the master key to your funds.
global.seedThief: If someone else has your seed they can steal your IOTA.
global.googlePlayServicesNotAvailable: Serviciul Google Play nu este disponibil
global.couldNotVerifyDeviceIntegrity: Nu se poate verifica integritatea dispozitivului deoarece Serviciile Google Play nu sunt disponibile.
global.noNetworkConnectionExplanation: Conexiunea dumneavoastră de internet pare să fie oprită.
global.spentAddressExplanation: ATENȚIE: Fonduri existente pe o adresă folosită
global.discordInformation: Trimiterea de fonduri mai mult de o dată de la aceeași adresă este periculoasă. Vă rugăm să intrați pe canalul de #ajutor de pe Discord sa aflați ce trebuie să faceți.
global.androidInsecureClipboardWarning: Sistemul Android nu asigură un sistem de copiere securizat.
global.androidCopyPasteWarning: Niciodată nu copia/lipi seed-ul pe un dispozitiv cu Android.
global.deviceMayBecomeUnresponsive: Your device may become unresponsive for a while.
global.ifYourBalanceIsNotCorrect: If your balance is not correct, it is likely that you are using a pre-snapshot seed.
global.headToAdvancedSettingsForTransition: Head to Advanced Settings and perform a Snapshot Transition.
global.signedTrytesBroadcastErrorExplanation: There was a network error while broadcasting your transaction.
global.addressesAlreadySpentFrom: One or more of the addresses have already been spent from.
global.problemSendingYourTransaction: There was a problem sending your transaction.
global.problemPerformingProofOfWork: There was a problem performing proof of work.
global.tryingAgainWithLocalPoW: Trying again with local Proof of Work.
global.tryingAgainWithDifferentNode: Trying again with a different node.
global.errorSyncingAddresses: Error syncing address information. Trying again with a different node.
global.errorAccessingKeychainExplanation: Cannot access keychain required for secure storage.
global.shouldUpdateExplanation: O nouă actualizare este disponibilă. Este recomandat ca dumneavoastră să actualizați la ultima versiune.
global.forceUpdateExplanation: A fost lansată o actualizare critică. Vă rugăm să actualizați aplicația acum.
global.missingPermission: Este necesară permisiunea sistemului de fișiere
global.missingPermissionExplanation: Accesul la sistemul de fișiere este necesar pentru a efectua această funcție.

addAdditionalSeed.seedInvalidCharsExplanation: Seed-urile poate fi alcătuit doar din majuscule de la A la Z și numărul 9. Seed-ul dumnevoastră conține caractere invalide. Vă rugăm încercați din nou.
addAdditionalSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seed-ul trebuie să fie de o lungime de {{maxLength}} caractere. Seed-ul dumneavoastră are momentan o lungime de {{currentLength}} caractere. Vă rugăm încercați din nou.
addAdditionalSeed.nameInUseExplanation: Vă rugăm să folosiți un nume de cont unic pentru seed-ul dumnevoastră.
addAdditionalSeed.accountNameTooLongExplanation: Account name maximum length is {{maxLength}} characters.
addAdditionalSeed.noNickname: Nu a fost introdus nici un nume de cont
addAdditionalSeed.noNicknameExplanation: Vă rugăm să introduceţi un nume de cont pentru secretul dumnevoastră.
addAdditionalSeed.seedInUseExplanation: Acest secret este deja legat de contul dumneavoastră. Vă rugăm folosiți altul.

changePassword.passwordUpdatedExplanation: Your password has been successfully updated.
changePassword.incorrectPasswordExplanation: Your current password is incorrect. Please try again.
changePassword.passwordsDoNotMatchExplanation: Parolele nu se potrivesc, vă rugăm să încercați din nou.
changePassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Parola dumneavoastră trebuie să conțină minim 11 caractere. Vă rugăm reîncercați.
changePassword.oldPasswordExplanation: You cannot use the old password as your new password. Please try again with a new password.
changePassword.ensureStrongPassword: Ensure you use a strong password of at least 11 characters.
changePassword.passwordTooWeakReason: Your password is too weak. Use a combination of words, and avoid common phrases, names or dates.
changePassword.reasonRow: Straight rows of keys are easy to guess.
changePassword.reasonPattern: Short patterns of keys are easy to guess.
changePassword.reasonNames: Common names and surnames are easy to guess.
changePassword.reasonRepeats: Repeats like 'aaa' are easy to guess.
changePassword.reasonRepeats2: Repeats like 'abcabcabc' are only slightly harder to guess than 'abc'.
changePassword.reasonSequence: Sequences like abc or 54321 are easy to guess.
changePassword.reasonYears: Recent years are easy to guess.
changePassword.reasonDates: Dates are often easy to guess.
changePassword.reasonTop10: This is a top 10 common password.
changePassword.reasonTop100: This is a top 100 common password.
changePassword.reasonCommon: This is a very common password.
changePassword.reasonSimilar: This is similar to a commonly-used password.
changePassword.reasonWord: Un singur cuvânt este ușor de ghicit.

setPassword.passwordTooShortExplanation: Parola dumneavoastră trebuie să fie de minim {{minLength}} caractere. Momentan este de {{currentLength}} caractere. Vă rugăm reîncercați.
setPassword.passwordMismatchExplanation: The passwords you have entered do not match. Please try again.
setPassword.anEncryptedCopy: Aceasta este parola portofelului dumneavoastră principal. O veți folosi când vă veți autentifica.

copyToClipboard.seedClearedExplanation: The seed has been cleared from the clipboard for your security.

enterSeed.invalidCharactersExplanation: Seed-urile poate fi alcătuit doar din majuscule de la A la Z și numărul 9. Seed-ul dumnevoastră conține caractere invalide. Vă rugăm încercați din nou.
enterSeed.seedTooShortExplanation: Seed-ul trebuie să fie de o lungime de {{maxLength}} caractere. Seed-ul dumneavoastră are momentan o lungime de {{currentLength}} caractere. Vă rugăm încercați din nou.
enterSeed.seedExplanation: Seed-ul ar trebui să aibă o lungime de {{maxLength}} caractere și ar trebui să conțină majuscule de la A la Z, sau cifra 9. Nu puteți folosi un seed cu o lungime mai mare de {{maxLength}} caractere.
enterSeed.neverShare: NU ÎMPĂRTĂȘIȚI SEED-UL DUMNEAVOASTRĂ CU NIMENI

login.emptyPasswordExplanation: Trebuie să introduceți o parolă pentru autentificare. Vă rugăm încercați din nou.
login.whyBiometricDisabled: De ce este autentificarea biometrică dezactivată?
login.whyBiometricDisabledExplanationPart1: Autentificarea biometrică este dezactivată la prima încărcare a aplicației pentru securitatea dumneavoastră.
login.whyBiometricDisabledExplanationPart2: Când folosiți Trinity veți fi delogat pentru inactivitate. Puteți să vă autentificați din nou cu autentificarea biometrică.

loading.thisMayTake: Aceasta s-ar putea sa dureze o vreme.
loading.takingAWhile: Acest lucru pare să dureze ceva timp

newSeedSetup.seedNotGeneratedExplanation: Please click the Generate New Seed button.
newSeedSetup.individualLetters: Apăsați literele individual pentru a le randomiza.
newSeedSetup.individualLetterCount: Apăsați încă <1><0>{{count}}</0></1> literă pentru a o randomiza.
newSeedSetup.individualLetterCount_plural: Apăsați încă <1><0>{{count}}</0></1> litere pentru a le randomiza.

onboardingComplete.walletReady: Portofelul este acum configurat și gata de utilizare. Dacă trebuie să faceți modificări în viitor, căutați în meniul Setări.

paperWallet.neverShare: Nu împărtășiți seed-ul dumneavoastră cu nimeni.
paperWallet.paperConvenience: Tipărirea pe hârtie a unei copii a seed-ului este o metodă convenabilă pentru a depozita seed-ul.
paperWallet.publicInsecure: Dar tipărirea pe un wifi public sau o imprimanta publică nu este sigură.
paperWallet.pleaseCheck: Vă rugăm să verificați și să confirmați înainte de a tipări
paperWallet.wifiConfirmation: Nu sunt pe un wifi public
paperWallet.printerConfirmation: Nu tipăresc pe o imprimantă publică

printBlankTemplate.printTemplateQuestion: Doriți să tipăriți un șablon gol?
printBlankTemplate.printTemplateInfo: Puteți tipări un șablon gol ca să vă ajute să scrieți seed-ul.
printBlankTemplate.printTemplateWarning: Asigurați-vă că depozitați seed-ul într-un spațiu sigur. Nu arătați seed-ul nimănui.

receive.addressCopiedExplanation: Your address has been copied to the clipboard.
receive.generateAnAddressExplanation: Please generate an address before using this function.
receive.generateAddressInformation: Generate a new deposit address every time you wish to receive IOTA

saveYourSeed.seedClearedExplanation: The seed has been cleared from the clipboard for your security.
saveYourSeed.youCanHighlightCharacters: You can highlight 9 characters at a time
saveYourSeed.everySeedHasAChecksum: Every seed has a corresponding 3-character checksum.
saveYourSeed.checksumExplanation: Whenever you add a seed to your wallet, you should ensure that the wallet-generated checksum matches the one you have written down.
saveYourSeed.mustSaveYourSeed: <0><0>You must save your seed with </0><1>at least one</1><2> of the options listed below.</2></0>

seedReentry.trinityWillNeverAskToReenter: Trinity will never ask you to re-enter this seed unless you reset your wallet or delete the app.
seedReentry.incorrectSeedExplanation: The seed you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
seedReentry.ifYouHaveNotSaved: If you have not saved your seed, please go back and do so.
seedReentry.enterSeedBelow: Enter your newly created seed below to confirm you have backed it up correctly
seedReentry.clipboardWarningExplanation: Paste is disabled for your security. You can drag and drop your seed from a text file instead.

send.invalidAddressExplanation1: Address should be {{maxLength}} characters long and should have a checksum.
send.invalidAddressExplanation4: Please check that you have entered the address correctly.
send.invalidAddressExplanationGeneric: Valid addresses should be 90 characters and contain only A-Z or 9.
send.notEnoughFundsExplanation: Nu aveţi suficient IOTA pentru a finaliza acest transfer.
send.invalidMessageTooLongExplanation: The message exceeds the max. amount of characters (1093).
send.invalidAmountExplanation: Please enter a valid transaction amount. It may be helpful to view the IOTA unit explanation at the bottom of this page.
send.addressPasteExplanation: It looks like you have pasted an address. Make sure that the address matches the one you want to send to.

setSeedName.canUseMultipleSeeds: You can use multiple seeds with this wallet. Each seed requires an account name.
setSeedName.youCanAdd: You can add more seeds in the Settings menu.

modeSelection.advancedModeExplanation: Advanced mode will display more detailed technical information.
modeSelection.modesExplanation: Only enable Advanced mode if you are experienced using IOTA. You may find it confusing otherwise.

settings.transferSendingExplanation: Please wait until your transfer has been sent.
settings.nicknameChangedExplanation: Your account name has been changed.
settings.accountDeletedExplanation: Your account has been removed from the wallet.
settings.cannotPerformActionExplanation: Du-te la setările avansate pentru a reseta portofelul.
settings.couldNotFetchRatesExplanation: Something went wrong while fetching conversion rate for {{currency}}.
settings.fetchedConversionRatesExplanation: Successfully fetched latest conversion rate for {{currency}}.
settings.autoNodeSwitching: Automatically switch node when selected is unreachable
settings.nodeChangeSuccessNoRemotePow: The node was changed to {{node}}. This node does not support remote Proof of Work.
settings.nodeChangeErrorExplanation: There was an error changing node. Please try again.

resetWalletRequirePassword.enterPassword: Enter your password to reset the wallet.

walletSetup.okay: Okay. Let's set up your wallet!
walletSetup.doYouNeedASeed: Do you need to create a new seed?
walletSetup.seedExplanation: Your IOTA seed is the master key to your funds. It is 81 characters long, using only letters A-Z or the number 9.
walletSetup.explanation: <0><0>You can use it to access your funds from</0><1> any wallet</1><2>, on</2><3> any device.</3></0>
walletSetup.loseSeed: But if you lose your seed, you also lose your IOTA.

welcome.thankYou: Thank you for downloading the IOTA wallet

writeSeedDown.writeDownYourSeed: <0> Write down your seed and checksum and </0><1>triple check</1><2> that they are correct.</2>

history.bundleHashCopiedExplanation: The bundle hash has been copied to the clipboard.
history.addressCopiedExplanation: The address has been copied to the clipboard.
history.messageCopiedExplanation: The message has been copied to the clipboard.
history.pleaseWait: Please wait, Trinity is promoting another bundle.
history.searchHelpText: Search by bundle hash or message content
history.searchHelpValue: Find transactions by exact iota value
history.searchHelpUnits: Find transactions by iota value and unit
history.searchHelpMore: Find transactions with a value greater than X
history.searchHelpLess: Find transactions with a value less than X

addCustomNode.customNodeCouldNotBeAdded: Custom node could not be added
addCustomNode.invalidNodeResponse: Nodul a returnat un răspuns nevalid

advancedSettings.autoPromotionExplanation: Auto-promotion helps to confirm your transactions on the Tangle. Enable this setting if you are having difficulty getting your transactions to confirm.
advancedSettings.autoPromotionPoW: Auto-promotion is only possible on nodes that support remote Proof of Work.

logoutConfirmationModal.logoutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?
logoutConfirmationModal.aboutToLogOut: You are about to log out

unitInfoModal.unitInfoExplanation: IOTAs are typically acquired in multiples of one million, but can be transferred as a single IOTA.

usedAddressModal.cantSpendFullBalanceQuestion: Why can't I spend my full balance?
usedAddressModal.spentAddressExplanation: You have funds on one or more spent addresses. Address reuse is dangerous in IOTA, so this wallet does not allow you to send from the same address more than once.
usedAddressModal.discordInformation: Please head to the #help channel on Discord to find out what you can do.

deleteAccount.areYouSure: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccount.yourSeedWillBeRemoved: Your seed and transaction history will be removed.
deleteAccount.enterPassword: Enter your password to delete this account.

manualSync.outOfSync: Does your transaction history look like it may be out of sync?
manualSync.pressToSync: Press the button below to sync your account.
manualSync.doNotClose: Please note, minimising the app will cancel the sync.

useExistingSeed.title: Enter an account name and seed
useExistingSeed.validSeedExplanation: Valid seeds should be 81 characters and contain only A-Z or 9.

viewSeed.enterPassword: Enter password to view your seed.
viewSeed.notAvailable: Seed export is not available for {{accountType}} account type
viewSeed.notAvailableExplanationLedger: Your ledger device uses a secure element to store your seed. The seed is safely encrypted and does not leave the device.

saveSeedConfirmation.didSaveSeed: Did you back up your seed?
saveSeedConfirmation.iHaveBackedUp: I have safely backed up my seed
saveSeedConfirmation.reenterSeed: At the next step you need to re-enter your seed.
saveSeedConfirmation.reenterSeedWarning: If you have not backed up your seed and your device fails, you will lose all of your IOTA.
saveSeedConfirmation.pleaseConfirm: Please confirm you have securely stored your seed.

walletResetConfirmation.warning: <0><0>All of your wallet data including your </0><1>seeds, password,</1><2> and </2><3>other account information</3><4> will be lost.</4></0>

fingerprintSetup.instructionsEnable: Touch fingerprint reader to enable fingerprint authentication
fingerprintSetup.instructionsDisable: Touch fingerprint reader to disable fingerprint authentication
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintAuthEnabledExplanation: You have successfully enabled biometric authentication.
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintAuthDisabledExplanation: You have successfully disabled biometric authentication.
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintAuthFailedExplanation: Fingerprint authentication failed. Please try again.
fingerprintSetup.fingerprintUnavailableExplanation: Your device does not support biometric authentication or it has not been configured in the device settings.
fingerprintSetup.notSupported: Device does not support biometric authentication
fingerprintSetup.notConfigured: Biometric authentication has not been configured in device settings
fingerprintSetup.buttonInstructionsDisable: Press the button below to disable fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.buttonInstructionsEnable: Press the button below to enable fingerprint authentication.
fingerprintSetup.buttonInstructionsDisableIPhoneX: Press the button below to disable Face ID
fingerprintSetup.buttonInstructionsEnableIPhoneX: Press the button below to enable Face ID
fingerprintSetup.instructionsLogin: Touch fingerprint reader to log in
fingerprintSetup.systemCancelledAuth: Authentication was cancelled by your device
fingerprintSetup.noPassword: Password is not set on device

transferConfirmation.youAreAbout: You are about to send {{contents}} to the address

seedVault.seedVaultExplanation: A SeedVault is an encrypted file for backing up your seed. The seed is encrypted with a SeedVault Key and cannot be accessed without that key.
seedVault.seedVaultWarning: Make sure you back up the file in multiple locations (e.g. hard drive, cloud, USB). If you lose this file and have not stored your seed elsewhere, you will lose your IOTA.
seedVault.exportFailExplanation: There was an problem exporting the SeedVault. Please ensure you have the appropriate permissions and enough free space.
seedVault.exportSuccessExplanation: Your encrypted seed file was exported successfully.
seedVault.unrecognisedKeyExplanation: The key was not recognised. Please try again.
seedVault.emptyKeyExplanation: You must enter a key. Please try again.
seedVault.dropInstructions: Drop SeedVault or text here <1></1> or click to browse
seedVault.enterKeyExplanation: Enter your key to open the SeedVault
seedVault.noSeedFound: SeedVault does not contain a valid seed
seedVault.noSeedFoundExplanation: The SeedVault is either empty or contains a seed in an invalid format.
seedVault.seedFileErrorExplanation: There was a problem opening the SeedVault. If you selected the correct file then it may be corrupted.
seedVault.invalidSeedFileErrorExplanation: This file format is not supported. Only SeedVault files (.kdbx) created via Trinity or a password manager are supported.
seedVault.seedVaultKeyExplanation: First we need to secure your SeedVault. Please choose a key to encrypt the file. You will use this key if you need to restore your seed from the SeedVault back up.

stateExport.stateExportExplanation: State export will store a txt file on your device with your account (transactions, addresses) information, wallet version, and names of storage files.
stateExport.exportSuccessExplanation: Your state file was exported successfully.

rootDetection.appearsRooted: Your device appears to be rooted.
rootDetection.securityRisk: This can pose a significant risk to the security of your wallet.
rootDetection.continueDepsiteRisk: Do you wish to continue despite this risk?

pow.feeless: It is necessary to complete a little proof of work to send feeless transactions in IOTA.
pow.localOrRemote: Proof of work can either be completed locally on your device, or offloaded to a node.
pow.powUpdatedExplanation: Your proof of work configuration has been updated.

autoPromotion.autoPromotionUpdatedExplanation: Your auto-promotion configuration has been updated.

snapshotTransition.cannotCompleteTransitionExplanation: Your balance must be greater than 0 to complete the transition.
snapshotTransition.transitionCompleteExplanation: The snapshot transition has completed successfully.
snapshotTransition.snapshotExplanation: Every so often, a snapshot is performed to prune the size of the Tangle.
snapshotTransition.hasSnapshotTakenPlace: Has a snapshot taken place? Press the button below to transition.

deepLink.deepLinkingOverview: Deep links are clickable links (iota://...) that automatically fill transaction data in Trinity.
deepLink.deepLinkingWarning: Be aware of phishing scams. Make sure the link you open navigates to the official Trinity app.
deepLink.deepLinkingInfoMessage: You opened an iota:// deep link but deep linking is not enabled.

updates.noUpdatesAvailableExplanation: You have the latest version of Trinity Desktop.
updates.newVersionAvailableExplanation: A new Trinity version is available. Do you want to update now?
updates.installUpdateExplanation: Download complete, Trinity will now restart to install the update.

tray.trayExplanation: Provides an overview of your account balances and recent transaction history.

proxy.proxyExplanation: Detect and use system wide network proxy settings. Close and reopen the wallet after changing this setting.

notifications.notificationExplanation: Receive system-wide notifications about new transactions.
notifications.typeMessages: Notify me about zero value transactions

bytetrit.sweepSucceededExplanation: Your funds have been successfully unlocked and moved to a new address. Promote the transactions to help them confirm.
bytetrit.sweepErrorExplanation: Something went wrong while unlocking your funds. Trying again.
bytetrit.explanation: Trinity Desktop version 0.3.4 contained a bug that can temporarily lock funds. This affects a small number of users that performed transactions with 0.3.4.
bytetrit.explanationAccounts: Locked funds have been detected on your accounts: {{accounts}}. Trinity will now automatically recover your funds, by moving them to a new address.
bytetrit.sweepConfirmation: You are about to sweep {{amount}} to the address {{address}}. Account: {{accountName}}, address index: {{index}}

migration.dataMigrationExplanation: Due to performance and storage limitations, Trinity is using a new database for storing settings and account data. Please wait while Trinity automatically migrates your existing data.
migration.problemMigratingYourData: There was a problem migrating your data. Please try again
migration.seedMigrationExplanation: As part of Trinity's continued effort to improve wallet security, your seed will be migrated to an enhanced storage methodology. Please wait while Trinity automatically migrates seed storage.

ledger.notReady: If you wish to use a Ledger device, connect and unlock it now
ledger.indexInUse: Index already in use for account {{account}}
ledger.indexInUseExplanation: Your chosen index is already in use on one of your accounts. Please choose another index number.
ledger.actionCancelledExplanation: Cannot perform the action without Ledger device access.
ledger.accountIndexExplanation: Your Ledger can store multiple seeds. Each seed is identified by a unique index number. An unused index has been pre-selected, but feel free to choose your own. Make sure you note down your chosen index number.
ledger.accountPageExplanation: Some third party wallets require pages.
ledger.connectionErrorExplanation: Check that your Ledger is connected and unlocked.
ledger.connectionExplanation: A Ledger device must be connected to perform this function.
ledger.transactionTitle: Scroll through and approve the transaction on your Ledger
ledger.transactionExplanation: Use your Ledger device to approve the outgoing transaction.
ledger.applicationExplanation: Go to your Ledger and open the IOTA app to continue using Trinity.
ledger.cannotSendZeroValueExplanation: Cannot send zero value transfers with a Ledger device.
ledger.ledgerDisconnectedExplanation: The Ledger device was disconnected. Please reconnect and try again.
ledger.ledgerDeniedExplanation: The transaction was denied on the Ledger device.
ledger.ledgerIncorrectIndexExplanation: The connected Ledger device does not match the one linked to this account, or the recovery phrase has been changed.
ledger.checkAddressExplanation: Check that the address matches the one displayed on your Ledger device.
ledger.applicationNotInitialisedExplanation: Reopen the IOTA app on your Ledger device, accept the informational warning and try again.
ledger.udevError: Could not communicate with Ledger device
ledger.udevErrorExplanation: Trinity could not communicate with your Ledger device. Please visit the URL below to resolve this issue.
